name: The Village (itch) (tsacoyianisb12)
description:
I made this game my junior year and is all about exploration and finding the hidden secrets on this strange island. Collect items, talk, and interact with the natives to open areas that you couldn't previously traverse before. This game helped me improve my knowledge of level design and I plan on making many more games like this. Some assets were downloaded for free on the unity 3D asset store. See my portfolio at bentgames.net.

CONTROLS:

"W,A,S,D" to control the character

"Spacebar" to jump

"F" to interact with objects and talk

"M" to pause the camera

Use the mouse to look around.
